pages.text: Bugs can be reported using the Hilistia $(l:https://github.com/Hilistia/smp/issues/new?assignees=mmsheeks&labels=bug&projects=&template=bug_report.md&title=%5BBUG+REPORT%5D)Bug Tracker$(/l). Please fill in as much detail as possible to help us resolve issues quickly.
Throughout the run of the alpha, bugs will be addressed by priority with rolling releases on an as-needed basis. Ideally we will have no more than one new alpha version per week.
